thread.title: Deal of the Week: Tech Training Bundle 500+ courses (97% off)
thread.title_full: Deal of the Week: Tech Training Bundle 500+ courses (97% off)

author: Martin Brinkmann
title: Deal of the Week: Tech Training Bundle 500+ courses (97% off)
text:
Deal of the Week: Tech Training Bundle 500+ courses (97% off) By Martin Brinkmann on October 14, 2015 in Deals - Last Update: October 14, 2015 0 
This deal provides you with lifetime access to EduCBA's current and future course list. The Tech Training Bundle consists of more than 500 e-learning courses aimed at designers, coders, system administrators and IT workers. 
The main categories provided by the educational site are: Programming Languages (146 courses, including Java, Python, C, Ruby, Haskell, VB,bet and many others). Web Development (192 courses, including creation of mobile apps, system administration, PHP, MYSQL, HTML5 and more). Data & Analytics (105 courses, including SAS programming, R programming, Excel and more). Design & Animation (63 courses, including 3D Design, Corel Draw, Cinema 4D, Adobe and Unity). IT Certification (48 courses including SAS, CCNA, Hacking, Business Analytics, Salesforce and CAP). Mobile Apps (46 courses, including Android and iOS training, mobile app development and more). Engineering Courses (38 courses, including AI, Software Development Life Cycle, Online ISO 27001 and Computer Fundamentals). Some courses offer more than 80 hours of content while the average is usually in the 10-20 hour range. Details Score lifetime access to all future courses Access expert instructors via online Academic Support Take mock tests & quizzes online Add certificates of completion to your resume Check out courses on IT, software, development, testing, networking, programming, 3D, design, CAD & more Develop web apps using HTML, CSS, PHP & Javascript Master languages such as: C, C++, C#, Java, Ruby, Python, PERL, etc. 
Make sure you check out other offers on Ghacks Deals . The frontpage lists newest sales, freebies, giveaways and more. Please share this article About Martin Brinkmann Martin Brinkmann is a journalist from Germany who founded Ghacks Technology News Back in 2005. He is passionate about all things tech and knows the Internet and computers like the back of his hand. You can follow Martin on Facebook , Twitter or Google+
